post.description:
API View that receives a POST with a user's username and password.

Returns a JSON Web Token that can be used for authenticated requests.
post.summary: API View that receives a POST with a user's username and password.

post.description: Use this endpoint to activate user account.
post.summary: Use this endpoint to activate user account.

post.description:
API View that receives a POST with a user's username and password.

Returns a JSON Web Token that can be used for authenticated requests.
post.summary: API View that receives a POST with a user's username and password.

post.description: Use this endpoint to send email to user with password reset link.
post.summary: Use this endpoint to send email to user with password reset link.

post.description: Use this endpoint to finish reset password process.
post.summary: Use this endpoint to finish reset password process.

post.description: Use this endpoint to register new user.

username.description: Required. 150 characters or fewer. Letters, digits and @/./+/-/_ only.

post.summary: Use this endpoint to register new user.

post.description:
Implements an endpoint to convert a provider token to an access token

The endpoint is used in the following flows:

* Authorization code
* Client credentials
post.summary: Implements an endpoint to convert a provider token to an access token

post.description: Implements an endpoint to revoke access or refresh tokens
post.summary: Implements an endpoint to revoke access or refresh tokens

post.description:
Implements an endpoint to provide access tokens

The endpoint is used in the following flows:

* Authorization code
* Password
* Client credentials
post.summary: Implements an endpoint to provide access tokens

post.description:
API View that checks the veracity of a token, returning the token if it
is valid.
post.summary: API View that checks the veracity of a token, returning the token if it

post.description:
This is a duplicate of rest_framework's own ObtainAuthToken method.
Instead, this returns an Auth Token based on our callback token and source.
post.summary: This is a duplicate of rest_framework's own ObtainAuthToken method.
